channel.title: I need help with changing NPC hp
channel.description:
I want to make the Jad so it has 800 hp instead of 172, because it is too easy to kill...( i can kill it in 1 hit)
does anyone know hot to change a npc's hp?
if so, please tell me cuz i need to know... :P

item.title: I need help with changing NPC hp
item.dc:creator: @Tazuko Tazuko
item.description:
@Tazuko wrote:

if i change it i always kill in 1 punch =S

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with changing NPC hp

item.title: I need help with changing NPC hp
item.dc:creator: @toastface5 toastface5
item.description:
@toastface5 wrote:

thanks, I’ll see if it works

EDIT: it 1st of all said the Jad had 3200 hp. It actually had 172, secondly, i changed it to 800, compiled, and ran, and it appeared the Jad had 32 hp…this is weird, can anybody help me?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with changing NPC hp

item.title: I need help with changing NPC hp
item.dc:creator: @pkscapeftw pkscapeftw
item.description:
@pkscapeftw wrote:

Go to npc.cfg
search for 2745 ( i guess thats the ip from jad )
and change the seccond number to your new hp

Read full topic
